definitions.definition: A minor detail , often of negligible importance .
examples: They spent all their time on minutiae , never making real progress.

definitions.definition: Any of the point features on fingerprints used for matching , usually endings and bifurcations of ridges .

main_definition: A minor detail , often of negligible importance .
secondary_definitions: ( biometrics , forensics ) Any of the point features on fingerprints used for matching , usually endings and bifurcations of ridges .
